name: Steven Quebek
comment: I had a wonderful time! The river is fast, but not too strong, so I could enjoy even though I am inexperienced. My wife fell into the river and we haven't seen her ever since.

name: Ivana Kindl
comment: To be honest, I made a mistake and went rafting with Jacques Houdek. Have you seen that man? Well, bascially, we couldn't really move from the starting position and we spent the whole afternoon stuck.

name: Pamela Anderson
comment: Wonderful! I had such a great time, my T-shirt was wet all the time so my rafting instructor payed extra attention to me!

name: Susan Green
comment: Absolutely horrible! As a proud member of Christian Church of Purity, I do not recommend any true believer to go there. I saw a blonde woman in a wet T-shirt, attracting her instructor's attention as if she was the Devil herself!

name: Toni Cetinski
comment: This was very good, I had an exciting time but I'm afraid I might have hurt my vocal chords when I accidentally hit myself with an oar.

name: Bob Rosemary
comment: I am not good at this. I thought maybe I could give it a try, but I fell into the water seven times. SEVEN! I'm lucky I didn't die... Maybe I should try something else.

name: Joey Diaz
comment: Let me tell you something, Joe Rogan. This was tremendous. I had such an exciting time, I stood up in the middle of the boat and yelled like that time I was overdosed on cocaine back in '87 on West Boulevard

name: Mate Miso Kovac
comment: Stankovicu, kad sam ja zaveslao niz tu rijeku, nabujalu, podivljalu, pomislio sam to je to. Stankovicu, nebo se spojilo sa zemljom, ovako nesto se dogodi samo jednom u zivotu.
